Una celebraci√≥n en M√©xico para Mi; Xiaomi has officially launched in Mexico!! Our awesome partners and Mi fans were there to welcome the arrival of Redmi Note 4, Redmi 4X, and Mi Community LATAM, the official home for our passionate Mi fans in Latin America. 

Check out these snaps from the launch and make sure to follow Mi Mexico for updates on when you can get your hands on Mi. :)

New York Magazine's Select All calls Mi Power Bank the best battery pack for most people. Get yours here: http://www.mi.com/en/pb10000pro/

"With a 10,000 mAh (milliamp hour) battery, you'll have plenty of juice, enough to completely recharge your phone at least three times, and possibly more. 

Mi allows for you to both charge its battery and charge a device connected to it at the same time....it has just the right form factor for everyday use, it's very close in shape and weight to an actual smartphone, meaning you can slip it into a pocket if you're going out without a bag for the day, and still have backup battery. 

If you find yourself constantly hovering in the red on your smartphone, the Mi Power Pack is the battery pack to grab."
Here's a sneak peek of Xiaomi's new building in Beijing where our team will hang out to work hard and cook up something wonderful for our Mi fans. :) Check it out!

Mi 6 is the culmination of our 7 years of research and development. It comes equipped with a dual camera with optical zoom, 12MP wide angle with 4-axis OIS stabilization + 12MP telephoto; exceptional portrait photography with background blur, and Beautify for natural selfie enhancements.

The culmination of our 7 years of research and development is here! Meet Mi 6, our latest flagship powered by Qualcomm‚Äôs next-generation Snapdragon 835 processor.

The culmination of our 7 years of research and development is here! Meet Mi 6, our latest flagship powered by Qualcomm‚Äôs next-generation Snapdragon 835 processor. Mi 6 is the first device to bring Snapdragon 835 based on the 10nm FinFET technology, to China. Precisely crafted like a watch, Mi 6 seamlessly integrates four-sided 3D curved glass and a stainless steel frame. It comes with an optical zoom dual camera that takes clearer photos of distant subjects, and gives portrait shots an unparalleled background blur effect. 

Check out Mi 6‚Äôs specs:

Our engineers share their inspiration behind the design of the Red Dot Best of the Best 2017 Winner, Mi Electric Scooter!

Always believe that something wonderful is about to happen!

This #MFF2017 was nothing but amazing as we had 1.45 Million fans celebrating our 7th Birthday with us! 

Thank you for all the fun times and we look forward to #MFF2018 together!

#MFF2017 was super exciting as this is our very first global Mi Fan Festival where Mi fans from around the world played against each other in Tap Mi! 

Do you <3 it?
Big hugs for celebrating our 7th birthday with Mi Fan Festival! It was a period of milestones and we couldn't have done it without you. See you next year!

It's been 203 days since our Mi 5s launch. As with our every flagship device, the Mi 6 is a guaranteed performance beast. The workmanship involved is also an accumulated effort of our dreams for the past 7 years. We can't wait to show you what's to come, so stay tuned to our Beijing Mi 6 launch event on 19 April!

Out of over 5,500 products submitted for the Red Dot Award this year, only 102 of them won the reddot Best of the Best 2017 Award and Mi Electric Scooter is one of the winners!

Mi Electric Scooter has a top speed of 25km/h and comes equipped with LG 18650 lithium ion battery. It can be folded with a quick press of a button and takes just three seconds to compress itself, and this is just a couple of its many amazing features!

What do you think? Comment below!

We've achieved yet another milestone! After Mi LED Desk Lamp was awarded the prestigious Gold iF World Design Award earlier this year, Mi Electric Scooter was also recently awarded the reddot Best of the Best 2017 Award!

The ‚ÄúRed Dot" is established internationally and easily recognized worldwide as one of the most sought-after quality marks for good design. 

Hit üëç right now to celebrate this amazing feat!
Mi Fan Festival is back! Try your hand at the TapMi game we've created for you and check to see if you can be the top scorer in your country. Check it out and start playing! :) #MFF2017
Switch between your professional and personal self  easily with MIUI's Dual Apps feature. Keep things separate and handy with just one click. Is this a feature you use often? üòä

Yesterday, Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun went on Mi Live in India for the first time to talk about India's achievements and milestones, signaling more good times ahead for India. :) Were you able to check it out? Make sure to download the Mi Live app to catch a replay soon!
